open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat
problem:
WLOG, let $a, b, c, \in \mathbb{R^+}$ s.t. $a \le b \le c$ . Then, $a = u, b = u+v, c = u+v+w$ , for some $u, v, w \ge 0$ . 

Then, if $ab(a+b)+bc(b+c)+ca(c+a)\leq 2(a^3+b^3+c^3)$ we have 

  egin{align*}ab(a+b)+bc(b+c)+ca(c+a) &\leq 2(a^3+b^3+c^3) \
\implies u*(u+v)*(u+u+v)+(u+v)*(u+v+w)*(u+v+u+v+w)+(u+v+w)*u*(u+v+w+u) & \leq 2*(u^3+(u+v)^3+(u+v+w)^3) \
\implies 6 u^3+12 u^2 v+6 u^2 w+8 u v^2+8 u v w+2 u w^2+2 v^3+3 v^2 w+v w^2 & \leq 6 u^3+12 u^2 v+6 u^2 w+12 u v^2+12 u v w+6 u w^2+4 v^3+6 v^2 w+6 v w^2+2 w^3 \
\implies 0 & \leq 4 u v^2+4 u v w+4 u w^2+2 v^3+3 v^2 w+5 v w^2+2 w^3 \
\end{align*} which is true, so we're done.
informal_prefix:
/-- WLOG, let $a, b, c, \in \mathbb{R^+}$ s.t. $a \le b \le c$ . Then, $a = u, b = u+v, c = u+v+w$ , for some $u, v, w \ge 0$ . 

Then, if $ab(a+b)+bc(b+c)+ca(c+a)\leq 2(a^3+b^3+c^3)$ we have 

  egin{align*}ab(a+b)+bc(b+c)+ca(c+a) &\leq 2(a^3+b^3+c^3) \
\implies u*(u+v)*(u+u+v)+(u+v)*(u+v+w)*(u+v+u+v+w)+(u+v+w)*u*(u+v+w+u) & \leq 2*(u^3+(u+v)^3+(u+v+w)^3) \
\implies 6 u^3+12 u^2 v+6 u^2 w+8 u v^2+8 u v w+2 u w^2+2 v^3+3 v^2 w+v w^2 & \leq 6 u^3+12 u^2 v+6 u^2 w+12 u v^2+12 u v w+6 u w^2+4 v^3+6 v^2 w+6 v w^2+2 w^3 \
\implies 0 & \leq 4 u v^2+4 u v w+4 u w^2+2 v^3+3 v^2 w+5 v w^2+2 w^3 \
\end{align*} which is true, so we're done.-/
name: lean_workbook_plus_41793
